comments.en:
Large-format inkjet printer.

600 dpi in grayscale, only 300 dpi in color.

Works "almost" - RGB data is sent to the plotter.

The CMYK mode of the "B"-Models and the 75x Series is not supported. Images are somewhat "greenish"; gray is composed of CMY. Nice for really LARGE printouts ... (ISO A4-A0), (ANSI A, B...), (DIN C4, C3...)...

Driver: With HP RTL and PostScript color resolution is always 300x300 dpi.

Addressable 600 dpi using sharp lines for vector graphics in HP-GL/2.

Consumables/Refills: 4 Cartriges
